description: This Dart source file contains end-to-end integration tests for a Flutter application, testing route mounting, widget rebuilding, and stability of key UI components.

methods.name: _pumpEndOfFrame
methods.description: Helper function to pump the widget tree and wait for the end of a frame, used to maintain test determinism.

methods.name: _pumpUntil
methods.description: Helper function to pump frames until a specified condition is true or a timeout occurs.

methods.name: _waitForFinder
methods.description: Helper function to wait until a widget identified by a Finder appears in the widget tree or timeout occurs.
